name: Zamberlan 205 Stroll Gore-Tex Light Trail Shoes - Men's
description: Pull on grip and water-protection when heading out for strolls on the trail or around the block. These light trail shoes have a full Gore-Tex bootie to keep your feet dry through dewy grass or a light shower. The cushioned midsole and MegaGrip rubber keep your feet happy and secure in slippery or uneven trails.Suede upper has a water-resistant Hydrobloc treatment.Gore-Tex Extended Comfort waterproof-breathable membrane keeps water out.PU toe and heel protection adds durability in high-wear areas.EVA midsole cushions and supports feet in uneven terrain.Vibram® MegaGrip outsole is lightweight and grippy for traction in wet and dry terrain.
